title: ENIAC
description: ENIAC was the first general-purpose electronic digital computer, designed for the U.S. Army during World War II.

title: First Microprocessor
description: The Intel 4004 was the first commercially available microprocessor, revolutionizing computing.

title: IBM PC
description: IBM introduced its first personal computer, which set the standard for future PCs.

title: World Wide Web
description: Tim Berners-Lee developed the World Wide Web, making the internet accessible to the public.

title: Windows 95
description: Microsoft released Windows 95, a major milestone in personal computing.

title: Facebook Launch
description: Facebook, a social media platform, was launched and quickly became popular worldwide.

title: iPhone
description: Apple introduced the first iPhone, revolutionizing mobile computing.

title: iPad
description: Apple launched the iPad, popularizing tablet computing.
